thread.title: Missue Oko

author: Missue Oko
title: Missue Oko
text: read about play-asia good feedback and trusted to them, did order #39965283, they cancelled the order once I did it, money not returned yet, I think they will take for refund 3-7 days. But in any way I did just one order and paid with credit card with vbv password, they once cancelled it, why? Now I read many messages, that they as scammers will ask western union and promise something solve with them account team, but as write many other people it will not help. If you will want lost money, nervous and respect, so buy from play-asia.
